problem_text_cn: 如图,过⊙O上一点C作⊙O的切线,交直径AB的延长线于点D,若∠A=25°,则∠D的度数为()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, the tangent line of ⊙O is made at point C on ⊙O, and the extended line of the intersection diameter AB is at point D. If ∠A = N_0, then the degree of ∠D is ()
raw_comment: 本题主要考查的是切线的性质、等腰三角形的性质、三角形的外角的性质、三角形的内角和定理,求得∠DOC和∠OCD的度数是解题的关键．
